text:
@NYGovCuomo .Wonderful sentiment! 
Release experimental #COVID19 therapies like #Hydroxychloroquine to physician offices & clinics!
We need immediate access to any drugs that can help!
Most will avoid hospitalization!
Many lives will be salvaged!
End the restriction of needed treatments!
